record.field: AA | Fixed assets held for sale arising from gifts and bequests not received and temporary usufruct
AC | Tangible and financial fixed assets
AE | Patents, licences, software and similar rights
AG | Advances and deposits paid on intangible assets
SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_AI.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_AJ.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_AK.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_AL.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_AM.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_AN.balance
AL | Equipment, furniture and biological assets
AN | Advance payments on tangible assets
BW | Banks, financial institutions and similar entities
CZ | Total own and similar resources
CK | Total equity and similar resources

SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CA.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CB.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CC.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CD.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CE.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CF.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CG.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CH.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CI.balance + SYSCEBNL_ASSOC_CJ.balance
CA | Non-expendable allocation without right of withdrawal
CB | Non-expendable appropriation with right of withdrawal
CH | Net profit for the year (surplus + or deficit -)
CY | Total restricted and deferred funds
CW | Restricted funds and funds from gifts and bequests of fixed assets
DD | Total financial debts and similar liabilities
DC | Provisions for liabilities and charges
DW | Banks, financial institutions and overdrafts
